snippet: Rocket Internet, which funds e-commerce start-ups that mimic proven business models, operates in sharp contrast to Silicon Valley, where originality is prized.
abstract: Rocket Internet, which funds e-commerce start-ups that mimic proven business models, operates in sharp contrast to Silicon Valley, where originality is prized; company has turned usual business model for tech companies upside down, compiling team of finance and management specialists armed with money needed to mimic already successful Internet companies and applying proven ideas in other countries, often in emerging markets.
lead_paragraph: Rocket Internet, which funds e-commerce start-ups that mimic proven business models, operates in sharp contrast to Silicon Valley, where originality is prized.

headline.main: Copycat Business Model Generates Genuine Global Success for Start-Up Incubator
headline.print_headline: A Firm Thrives Building Global Copycats of the Tech Industry’s Hits
